# kevel Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "kevel" {
  api_key = "aaaaaaaa"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_base_url` (String) The base URL of the Kevel API.
- `api_key` (String, Sensitive) Your Kevel API Key.
